rule.name: NoFunctionOrConstructorCallsInArguments
rule.message: Avoid calls to functions or constructors in arguments.
rule.description: Arguments must not contain, calls to functions or constructors.

rule.name: NoMultipleFuctionOrConstructorCallsPerExpression
rule.message: Avoid having mutliple calls to functions or constructors in a statement.
rule.description: There must be no mutliple calls to functions or constructors in a single statement.
